verses.verse: Then worked<WH6213> Bezaleel<WH1212> and Aholiab,<WH171> and every<WH3605> wise<WH2450> hearted<WH3820> man,<WH376> in whom<WH834> <WH1992> the LORD<WH3068> put<WH5414> wisdom<WH2451> and understanding<WH8394> to know<WH3045> how to work<WH6213> all<WH3605> manner of work<WH4399> for the service<WH5656> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> according to all<WH3605> that the LORD<WH3068> had commanded.<WH6680>

And Moses<WH4872> called<WH7121> Bezaleel<WH1212> and Aholiab,<WH171> and every<WH3605> wise<WH2450> hearted<WH3820> man,<WH376> in whose<WH834> heart<WH3820> the LORD<WH3068> had put<WH5414> wisdom,<WH2451> even every<WH3605> one whose<WH834> heart<WH3820> stirred<WH5375> him up to come<WH7126> to the work<WH4399> to do<WH6213> it:

And they received<WH3947> of Moses<WH4872> all<WH3605> the offering,<WH8641> which<WH834> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> had brought<WH935> for the work<WH4399> of the service<WH5656> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> to make<WH6213> it with. And they brought<WH935> yet<WH5750> to him free<WH5071> offerings every morning.<WH1242>
And all<WH3605> the wise<WH2450> men, that worked<WH6213> all<WH3605> the work<WH4399> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> came<WH935> every man<WH376> from his work<WH4399> which<WH834> they made;<WH6213>

And they spoke<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559> The people<WH5971> bring<WH935> much<WH7235> more<WH7235> than enough<WH1767> for the service<WH5656> of the work,<WH4399> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> to make.<WH6213>

And Moses<WH4872> gave commandment,<WH6680> and they caused it to be proclaimed<WH5674> throughout the camp,<WH4264> saying,<WH559> Let neither<WH408> man<WH376> nor<WH408> woman<WH802> make<WH6213> any<WH5750> more<WH5750> work<WH4399> for the offering<WH8641> of the sanctuary.<WH6944> So the people<WH5971> were restrained<WH3607> from bringing.<WH935>
For the stuff<WH4399> they had<WH1961> was sufficient<WH1767> for all<WH3605> the work<WH4399> to make<WH6213> it, and too<WH3498> much.<WH3498>

And every<WH3605> wise<WH2450> hearted<WH3820> man among them that worked<WH6213> the work<WH4399> of the tabernacle<WH4908> made<WH6213> ten<WH6235> curtains<WH3407> of fine twined<WH7806> linen,<WH8336> and blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet:<WH8144> <WH8438> with cherubim<WH3742> of cunning<WH2803> work<WH4639> made<WH6213> he them.

The length<WH753> of one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> was twenty<WH6242> and eight<WH8083> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> of one curtain<WH3407> four<WH702> cubits:<WH520> the curtains<WH3407> were all<WH3605> of one<WH259> size.<WH4060>
And he coupled<WH2266> the five<WH2568> curtains<WH3407> one<WH259> to another:<WH259> and the other five<WH2568> curtains<WH3407> he coupled<WH2266> one<WH259> to another.<WH259>

And he made<WH6213> loops<WH3924> of blue<WH8504> on<WH5921> the edge<WH8193> of one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> from the selvedge<WH7098> in the coupling:<WH4225> likewise<WH3651> he made<WH6213> in the uttermost<WH7020> side<WH8193> of another curtain,<WH3407> in the coupling<WH4225> of the second.<WH8145>

Fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> made<WH6213> he in one<WH259> curtain,<WH3407> and fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> made<WH6213> he in the edge<WH7097> of the curtain<WH3407> which<WH834> was in the coupling<WH4225> of the second:<WH8145> the loops<WH3924> held<WH6901> one<WH259> curtain to another.<WH259>

And he made<WH6213> fifty<WH2572> clasps<WH7165> of gold,<WH2091> and coupled<WH2266> the curtains<WH3407> one<WH259> to another<WH259> with the clasps:<WH7165> so it became<WH1961> one<WH259> tabernacle.<WH4908>
And he made<WH6213> curtains<WH3407> of goats'<WH5795> hair for the tent<WH168> over<WH5921> the tabernacle:<WH4908> eleven<WH6249> <WH6240> curtains<WH3407> he made<WH6213> them.

The length<WH753> of one<WH259> curtain<WH3407> was thirty<WH7970> cubits,<WH520> and four<WH702> cubits<WH520> was the breadth<WH7341> of one<WH259> curtain:<WH3407> the eleven<WH6249> <WH6240> curtains<WH3407> were of one<WH259> size.<WH4060>
And he coupled<WH2266> five<WH2568> curtains<WH3407> by themselves,<WH905> and six<WH8337> curtains<WH3407> by themselves.<WH905>

And he made<WH6213> fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> on the uttermost<WH7020> edge<WH7097> of the curtain<WH3407> in the coupling,<WH4225> and fifty<WH2572> loops<WH3924> made<WH6213> he on the edge<WH7097> of the curtain<WH3407> which couples<WH2279> the second.<WH8145>
And he made<WH6213> fifty<WH2572> clasps<WH7165> of brass<WH5178> to couple<WH2266> the tent<WH168> together, that it might be one.<WH259>
And he made<WH6213> a covering<WH4372> for the tent<WH168> of rams'<WH352> skins<WH5785> dyed red,<WH119> and a covering<WH4372> of badgers'<WH8476> skins<WH5785> above<WH4605> that.
And he made<WH6213> boards<WH7175> for the tabernacle<WH4908> of shittim<WH7848> wood,<WH6086> standing<WH5975> up.
The length<WH753> of a board<WH7175> was ten<WH6235> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> of a board<WH7175> one cubit<WH520> and a half.<WH2677>

One<WH259> board<WH7175> had two<WH8147> tenons,<WH3027> equally<WH7947> distant<WH7947> one<WH259> from another:<WH259> thus<WH3651> did he make<WH6213> for all<WH3605> the boards<WH7175> of the tabernacle.<WH4908>
And he made<WH6213> boards<WH7175> for the tabernacle;<WH4908> twenty<WH6242> boards<WH7175> for the south<WH5045> side<WH6285> southward:<WH8486>

And forty<WH705> sockets<WH134> of silver<WH3701> he made<WH6213> under<WH8478> the twenty<WH6242> boards;<WH7175> two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under<WH8478> one<WH259> board<WH7175> for his two<WH8147> tenons,<WH3027> and two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under<WH8478> another<WH259> board<WH7175> for his two<WH8147> tenons.<WH3027>
And for the other<WH8145> side<WH6763> of the tabernacle,<WH4908> which is toward the north<WH6828> corner,<WH6285> he made<WH6213> twenty<WH6242> boards,<WH7175>
And their forty<WH705> sockets<WH134> of silver;<WH3701> two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under<WH8478> one<WH259> board,<WH7175> and two<WH8147> sockets<WH134> under<WH8478> another<WH259> board.<WH7175>
And for the sides<WH3411> of the tabernacle<WH4908> westward<WH3220> he made<WH6213> six<WH8337> boards.<WH7175>
And two<WH8147> boards<WH7175> made<WH6213> he for the corners<WH4742> of the tabernacle<WH4908> in the two sides.<WH3411>

And they were coupled<WH8382> beneath,<WH4295> and coupled<WH8535> together<WH3162> at<WH413> the head<WH7218> thereof, to one<WH259> ring:<WH2885> thus<WH3651> he did<WH6213> to both<WH8147> of them in both<WH8147> the corners.<WH4742>

And there were eight<WH8083> boards;<WH7175> and their sockets<WH134> were sixteen<WH8337> <WH6240> sockets<WH134> of silver,<WH3701> under<WH8478> every<WH259> board<WH7175> two<WH8147> sockets.<WH134>
And he made<WH6213> bars<WH1280> of shittim<WH7848> wood;<WH6086> five<WH2568> for the boards<WH7175> of the one<WH259> side<WH6763> of the tabernacle,<WH4908>

And five<WH2568> bars<WH1280> for the boards<WH7175> of the other<WH8145> side<WH6763> of the tabernacle,<WH4908> and five<WH2568> bars<WH1280> for the boards<WH7175> of the tabernacle<WH4908> for the sides<WH3411> westward.<WH3220>
And he made<WH6213> the middle<WH8484> bar<WH1280> to shoot<WH1272> through<WH8432> the boards<WH7175> from the one end<WH7097> to the other.<WH8145>

And he overlaid<WH6823> the boards<WH7175> with gold,<WH2091> and made<WH6213> their rings<WH2885> of gold<WH2091> to be places<WH1004> for the bars,<WH1280> and overlaid<WH6823> the bars<WH1280> with gold.<WH2091>

And he made<WH6213> a veil<WH6532> of blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet,<WH8144> <WH8438> and fine twined<WH7806> linen:<WH8336> with cherubim<WH3742> made<WH6213> he it of cunning<WH2803> work.<WH4639>

And he made<WH6213> thereunto four<WH702> pillars<WH5982> of shittim<WH7848> wood, and overlaid<WH6823> them with gold:<WH2091> their hooks<WH2053> were of gold;<WH2091> and he cast<WH3332> for them four<WH702> sockets<WH134> of silver.<WH3701>

And he made<WH6213> an hanging<WH4539> for the tabernacle<WH168> door<WH6607> of blue,<WH8504> and purple,<WH713> and scarlet,<WH8144> <WH8438> and fine twined<WH7806> linen,<WH8336> of needlework;<WH7551>

And the five<WH2568> pillars<WH5982> of it with their hooks:<WH2053> and he overlaid<WH6823> their capitals<WH7218> and their fillets<WH2838> with gold:<WH2091> but their five<WH2568> sockets<WH134> were of brass.<WH5178>
